Author: situationtypedill
Text: I worked after hours with my manager and he ordered a pizza to the store for dinner and he offered me some and I said no thank you and he said “are you watching your figure” and I said “aha!!!” And then he said “what are you? A size6? 8?” And I wanted to SCREAM because I am a size 12/14 and I felt like he was making fun of me
